titles.title: Making accession to the Treaty for the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons a condition for designation as a beneficiary developing country under the Generalized System of Preferences.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E994)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 4/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to add as a condition to a country's designation as a beneficiary developing country eligible for trade benefits under the Generalized System of Preferences that it accede to the Treaty for the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons.
